Package main.util

Class PacketBuilder

java.lang.Object
main.util.PacketBuilder
public class PacketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
A custom class designed for the incremental building of packets.
Author:
Tony Zeidan, Evan Lloyd, Shaopeng Liu, Leenesh Kumar, YouHeng Zhou, Dominic Motora

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> message
    The bytes of the message to be sent.
    private java.net.DatagramPacket packet
    The internal packet to build upon.
    private boolean receiving
    Whether this packet is being received or sent.

      Adds a list of integers to the message (not separated).

    • makeSendPacket

      public void makeSendPacket​(java.net.InetAddress addr, int port)
      Compiles the internal message into a packet, ready to send.
      Parameters:
      addr - The address the packet is being sent to
      port - The port of the destination address

    • makeSendPacket

      public void makeSendPacket​(int port) throws java.net.UnknownHostException
      Compiles the internal message into a packet, ready to send to the local host.
      Parameters:
      port - The port of the local host to send to
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException - When the local host can not be resolved

    • packetToString

      public static java.lang.String packetToString​(java.net.DatagramPacket pckt, boolean recv)
      Retrieves the packet in string form.
      Parameters:
      pckt - The packet to retrieve string form of
      Returns:
      A string of the packet

      Clears the internal message and packet.

    • packetPrintString

      public static java.lang.String packetPrintString​(java.net.DatagramPacket pckt, java.lang.String host, boolean receiving)
      Retrieves a message demonstrating the passing of this packet.
      Parameters:
      pckt - The packet that is being received or sent
      host - The host that the packet is being sent to
      receiving - Whether the packet is being received or delivered
      Returns:
      The message string as described above
